snippet.title: BattleTech: The Crescent Hawks Revenge gameplay (PC Game, 1990)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for BattleTech: The Crescent Hawks Revenge, Dos PC game produced by Infocom in 1990 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/battletech-2/5874/
Watching the intro and playing out a mission in this sci-fi adventure.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
The Settlers 2 - https://youtu.be/Qua2kb5GgQI
Midwinter 2 - https://youtu.be/TSq2YnTcZR0
Breach 2 - https://youtu.be/LCjT6Q7bJFE
